moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores a bit of an ally’s HP.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of lowering the target’s Defense.

moves.name: Let’s Go!
moves.effect: Increases the move gauges of all allied sync pairs by two. Sharply raises the user’s Attack.

syncMove.name: Endless Possibilities Extreme Evoboost
syncMove.description: Increases the user’s move gauge by the user’s current move level. Sharply raises the Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, and accuracy of all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: Benefactor
passives.description: Transfers this sync pair’s stat increases to the sync pair that will switch in when this sync pair switches out.
